## findFilesByName() function

Search for files by name.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function findFilesByName(fs: FileSystemAdapter, path: PathAdapter, name: string, dir: string): Promise<{
    paths: string[];
    entries: DirectoryEntry[];
}>;
```
